name: HunnyPotr by Recce7
tagline: Technical Documentation For The Easily Extensible Honey Pot
body:
# Purpose of Project
Create a one-click-install honey pot that any Security Engineer or Systems Administrator can easily write custom plugins for applications or services running on their network.  The honey pot needs to display critical data to the user in an easy to read and navigate format.  This tool is useful to show what kind of attacks are going on and verify that the actual services are guarded appropriately.


# Features and Libraries Used

### Displaying Reporting Data with [Grafana](http://grafana.org/)
![](recce7.github.io/images/dashboard_ex.png)
EXAMPLE IMAGE GRAFANA.ORG

### Passive OS Fingerprinting with [P0f](http://lcamtuf.coredump.cx/p0f3/)
Still in development :: By passively listening to the TCP Handshake between our honey pot and the attacker we are able to pull the following data:
     * Detected Remote Operating System
     * HTTP Client if available, i.e. browser, version and user agent; curl version; wget version
* Network Link
* Distance
* Language
* Uptime

### Geoip
Still in development

### REST API
Able to sort data and serves JSON Arrays based on arguments in request
